dct_title_s: LE NOUVEAU MEXIQUE, et LA FLORIDE; Tir√©es de diverses Cartes, et Relations
dct_description_sm: Published "Chez l'Autheur Re., Avec Privilege du Roy, pour vingt Ans. 1679."
Wagner 374; Wheat 50; Tooley 14 (Plate 31); Leighly 27, BN Sanson V A & D(87).
Par N. Sanson d'Abbeville Geogr ordre du Roy.

California as an island with indented northern coast. Agubela de Cato as peninsula on mainland to north. Engraved by: Somer Sculp. (bottom right).Title cartouche of draped cloth tied with ribbons (top right).
